name: Serhat Kaya
body:
### Coding
I am Serhat Kaya, an early-20 versatile person who is currently a physics master student. My professions are academical data analysis, web design, and android development. I spend most of my time for solving various problems in computational world.

### Other Than Coding
When i am not coding, i usually read, write, travel and take photographs, swim, and search for new experiences.

I am occasionally on [twitter](https://twitter.com/serhatt_kaya).

I am reachable by [email](l.serhat.kaya.l@gmail.com).

I am also on [github](https://github.com/srhtkaya).


Checkout my [CV](serhatkaya.me/serhatkaya.pdf).

===
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
